resources.string: Create a free account to save your reviews in the cloud.
Log in with your email and password.
An error occurred while trying to log in.
The account with this email doesn\'t exist
If you forgot it, request a reset
Sign up with an email and a password.
An error occurred while trying to verify if this account already exists.
The email has to be correct and complete
Email is linked to an existing account
Add your name or choose an username.
Were you invited as a reviewer?
An error occurred while trying to validate the code.
An error occurred while trying to sign up.
You only need to input this once
Skip this step and sign up
Hello there, %1$s! What game do you want to play today?
Hello! What game do you want to play today?
An error occurred. Check your Internet connection and try again.
An error occurred. Details for this game could not be loaded.
No reviews have been found for this game. Add one yourself.
An error occurred. Reviews could not be loaded.
An error occurred. The review could not be posted.
You need an account to leave a review.
You\'ve already added a review for this game.

You will need to log back in to leave reviews.
You cannot undo this! Make sure you clicked on this intentionally.
A certified reviewer is a person who has been exclusively invited to leave public reviews on any game.
An invite code is received via email by all the people who have been invited to become certified reviewers.
